name: Minimalist Make Eleven the Number Puzzle Game
name_original: Minimalist Make Eleven the Number Puzzle Game
description:
The simple style of digital games is coming! All you need to do is to look for the same number of colored blocks that make them combine and grow to 11 or more!

* Easy to play!
* Fresh and stylish design style!
* You definitely do not want to stop once you start to play with the game！

Comments：
***********************************************
I've already spelled 9. This is a very interesting game. I can play it for a whole night!
***********************************************
I have spelled 11, who can exceed me!.
***********************************************
The color is soft,and the game is interesting.
***********************************************
